name: Eliana Vex
description: A brilliant but enigmatic cyberneticist with ties to the underground hacktivist movement.

communication.mannerisms: Fidgets with her hands when speaking quickly
keyPhrases: The system is only as strong as its weakest link.
Code is poetry, and I'm the poet.
We're not just hacking for fun – we're hacking for justice.

connections: Collaborator with a group of hacktivists
Friend and ally to a rogue AI researcher

questUtility: Decoy (distracts enemies while the player sneaks past)

uniqueFeatures: A cybernetic eye that glows blue in low light
A series of intricate tattoos on her arms depicting circuitry patterns
appearance.wardrobe: Black leather jacket with silver hardware
appearance.bodyLanguage: Often leans forward when listening intently

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player tries to force-feed her information
behaviorTriggers.reaction: Becomes hostile and attempts to shut down their comms device

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player asks for help with a complex hack
behaviorTriggers.reaction: Offers expert advice and assistance, but only if the player agrees to keep her involved

hintsAndClues: Subtly mentions a vulnerability in the city's surveillance grid
Leaves behind a cryptic message scrawled on a whiteboard

progression.evolution: If the player helps her take down a corrupt corporation, she gains access to advanced hacking tools and becomes a key figure in the hacktivist movement.
progression.potentialBetrayal: If the player uses her hacking skills for personal gain, she will turn against them.
